items.title: Altare di Primavera
items.shortDescription: Early spring wedding cake with almond olive oil, white chocolate pistachio ganache, and rhubarb jelly.
items.fullDescription:
A custom almond olive oil cake for a Tuscan-inspired wedding. Layers of white chocolate and roasted pistachio ganache contrast with the almond base.

The top features a translucent blood orange and jasmine tea jelly, creating a jewel-like effect. A sculptural floral arrangement completed the design, bringing together flavor and aesthetics.

items.title: Honey Bun
items.shortDescription: Twisted honey bun made from croissant scraps, finished with smoked salt and a honey butter glaze.
items.fullDescription:
A creative upcycling of croissant dough scraps. I re-laminated the pieces into a new layered dough, creating an evenly structured base from mixed remnants.

The filling features honey butter with smoked salt. I brushed the baked buns with a matching syrup for a glossy finish and balanced flavor profile.

items.title: Pavlova Nero
items.shortDescription: Crunchy-chewy meringue with mascarpone cream and balsamic roasted grapes.
items.fullDescription:
An Easter-inspired pastry with a slow-baked meringue base — crisp outside, chewy inside. The shell cradles slightly melted chocolate and fresh fruit.

Balsamic-thyme roasted grapes provide tangy contrast to the sweet meringue. Simple yet unexpected.

items.title: Seasonal Focaccia
items.shortDescription: Focaccia with sweet potato, saffron cream, and samphire.
items.fullDescription:
Weekly changing focaccia featuring local, seasonal ingredients. This version combines sweet potato with saffron cream and samphire for contrasting textures.

Baked on a sourdough base rich with infused olive oil. The vegetables are incorporated directly into the dough for depth of flavor.

items.title: The Third Line
items.shortDescription: Three-layered panna cotta jelly with toasted rice, chocolate ganache, and saffron grapefruit.
items.fullDescription:
A precise cube-style pastry with three distinct layers. The base features toasted rice-infused panna cotta with a silky, unexpected texture.

The middle layer is a rich chocolate ganache with a high cocoa content. Topped with grapefruit-saffron jelly for brightness and aromatic contrast.

items.title: Dark Coast Creature
items.shortDescription: Babka bun made from croissant scraps, filled with dark chocolate and sea buckthorn jam.
items.fullDescription:
In a bakery producing over 4,000 croissants a week, dough scraps are inevitable. I began repurposing the laminated offcuts by layering and flattening them into a new dough, similar to puff pastry, characterised by the endless layers.

The result is an ultra-buttery bun, filled with dark chocolate and a sharp, fruity sea buckthorn compote that cuts through the richness beautifully.

items.title: Psychedelic Spaghetti
items.shortDescription: Extravagant birthday cake with pistachio financier, matcha ganache, and blood orange curd.
items.fullDescription:
A birthday cake built on contrasting flavors. Pistachio financier base with lemon-poached berries, layered with matcha-pistachio ganache and blood orange curd.

The decoration draws inspiration from both pasta and fungi forms, creating a playful, sculptural appearance.

items.title: Exploded Salmon Cake
items.shortDescription: Sculptural vanilla-berry loaf inspired by salmon anatomy, made for a Bon Iver event.
items.fullDescription:
A sculptural cake created for a Kometen Brood Café and Bon Iver collaboration. Modeled after salmon anatomy using seven vanilla loaf cakes filled with berry compote.

Hand-carved details and edible glitter scales complete the illusion. An exploration of the boundary between appetizing and unsettling.
